title: PubMed Generate Chart Input
description: Input schema for creating customizable PNG charts from structured publication data

chartType.description: Specifies the type of chart to generate.

title.description: The main title displayed above the chart.

width.description: The width of the chart canvas in pixels.

height.description: The height of the chart canvas in pixels.

dataValues.description: An array of data objects to plot the chart (e.g., [{ 'year': '2020', 'articles': 150 }]).

outputFormat.description: Specifies the output format for the chart.

xField.description: The field name from `dataValues` for the X-axis.

yField.description: The field name from `dataValues` for the Y-axis.

seriesField.description: The field name for creating multiple data series on the same chart.

sizeField.description: For bubble charts, the field name for encoding bubble size.
